Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-24786 affecting package moby-buildx for versions less than 0.7.1-24
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-24786 affecting package moby-buildx for versions less than 0.7.1-24. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-buildx is earlier than 0.7.1-24, affected by CVE-2024-24786
